fields.text: Thank you for calling LiveRamp in San Francisco, your identity resolution middleware partner for seamless data integration across marketing platforms.
For sales inquiries and product demos, press [INDEX].
If you'd like to schedule a live demo of our identity resolution platform, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with a sales representative to schedule your demo.
To learn about pricing, plans, and licensing options, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with a sales representative for pricing details.
For technical support and integration assistance, press [INDEX].
If you need help with setup, integration, or troubleshooting, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.
To check on the status of an existing support case, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we retrieve your support case details.
